All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ByteArrayXmlStreamReader
Stream reader that pairs xml stream with underlying byte array.
JacksonXmlConfiguration
Configuration for the Jackson XML parser and generator.
XmlContentProcessor
This class will handle subscribing to a Xml stream and binding once the events are complete in a non-blocking manner.
XmlHttpContentSubscriberFactory
Builds the Subscriber for XML requests.
XmlMapperFactory
Factory bean for creating the Jackson XmlMapper.
XmlMediaTypeCodec
A jackson based MediaTypeCodec that handles XML requests/responses.
XmlStreamConvertibleValues<V>
An implementation of ConvertibleValues backed by xml stream.
XmlStreamToObjectConverter
Converts ByteArrayXmlStreamReader to object.
